'''Rock 'n' Roll Dango Milk''' is a [[food]] item that can be bought from [[Tomoki]] during the [[Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness]] event.

Rock 'n' Roll Dango Milk restores '''26'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''570''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
